page.title: 02CROSSHILL VILLAGE
page.content: Crosshill is situated on the B7023, three miles south-east of Maybole on the A77.The village consists of one main street,King Street, and a road at right angles to it,Kirkmichael Road, which leads to Kirkmichael village. There are six farms around the village with sheep and cows grazing in the fields. There are two hotels,a church, a meeting-place of the Brethren, a school,a community centre and a sub-Post Office which is now the only shop in the village. The houses are terraced,once weavers cottages. There are approx 500 inhabitants in Crosshill.
